title: Ford Motor Company Partners with Climate Museum to Call Attention to Impacts of Climate Change Through Live Art Installation
description: Today, at the fourteenth convening of Climate Week NYC, the largest global climate event of its kind, Ford is partnering with the Climate Museum to bring in a live installation of “Someday, all this,” a mural by artist David Opdyke offering a bracing commentary on the impact of the climate crisis on the American landscape.
